data.title: ALTENBURG
data.text:
BURIAL PLACES OF SOVEREIGNS OF SAXE-HILDBURGHAUSEN AND ALTENBURG FROM A TO Z

ALTENBURG (GERMANY)

BURIED IN THE DUCAL MAUSOLEUM IN ALTENBURG CEMETERY (Altenburg, FÃ¼rstengruft im Friedhof, Steinweg):

01. Duke FREDERICK OF SAXE-ALTENBURG (+1834)

02. Duke JOSEPH OF SAXE-ALTENBURG (+1868)

03. Duchess AMALIA OF WÃRTTEMBERG (+1848), consort of Duke Joseph

04. Duke GEORGE OF SAXE-ALTENBURG (+1853)

05. Duchess MARIA OF MECKLENBURG-SCHWERIN (+1862), consort of Duke George.

The ducal remains laid to rest in the Ducal Chapel of Altenburg Cemetery (FÃ¼rstengruft) were relocated elsewhere in the cemetery in 1974. The Chapel is ruined now.

ALTENBURG (GERMANY)

BURIED IN THE MEMORIAL CHURCH OF DUCHESS AGNES (Altenburg, Herzogin Agnes GedÃ¤chtniskirche, Hausweg):

01. Duke ERNEST I OF SAXE-ALTENBURG (+1908)

02. Duchess AGNES OF ANHALT (+1897), consort of Duke Ernest I.

Buried in a sealed vault.

BÃCKEBURG (GERMANY)

BURIED IN THE MAUSOLEUM GARDEN

(BÃ¼ckeburg, Mausoleumsgarten, Richard Sahlastr.):

Duchess ADELAIDE OF SCHAUMBURG-LIPPE (+1971), consort of Duke Ernest II of Saxe-Altenburg

HILDBURGHAUSEN (GERMANY)

BURIED IN THE DUCAL MOUND, TOWN CEMETERY (Hildburghausen, FÃ¼rstenhÃ¼gel, StÃ¤dtischen Friedhof, Ahornweg):

01. Duke ERNEST OF SAXE-HILDBURGHAUSEN (+1715)

02. Duchess SOPHIA HENRIETTA OF WALDECK (+1702), consort of Duke Ernest

03. Duke ERNEST FREDERICK I OF SAXE-HILDBURGHAUSEN (+1724)

04. Duchess SOPHIA ALBERTINA OF ERBACH (+1742), consort of Duke Ernest Frederick I

05. Duke ERNEST FREDERICK II OF SAXE-HILDBURGHAUSEN (+1745)

06. Duchess CAROLINE OF ERBACH-FÃRSTENAU (+1758), consort of Duke Ernest Frederick II

07. Duke ERNEST FREDERICK III OF SAXE-HILDBURGHAUSEN (+1780)

08. Duchess LOUISE OF DENMARK (+1756), consort of Duke Ernest Frederick III

09. Duchess CHRISTIANE SOPHIA CHARLOTTE OF BRANDENBURG-KULMBACH (+1757), consort of Duke Ernest Frederick III

10. Duchess ERNESTINA AUGUSTA OF SAXE-WEIMAR-EISENACH (+1786), consort of Duke Ernest Frederick III

11. Duchess CHARLOTTE OF MECKLENBURG-STRELITZ (+1818), consort of Duke Frederick

TROCKENBORN-WOLFERSDORF (GERMANY)

BURIED IN THE DUCAL BURIAL GROUND

(Trockenborn-Wolfersdorf, Herzoglische GrabstÃ¤tte):

Duke ERNEST II OF SAXE-ALTENBURG (+1955)

Photo courtesy of Mr JÃ¶rg Heinrich

LIST OF SOVEREIGNS OF SAXE-HILDBURGHAUSEN AND ALTENBURG 1680-1918

DUCHY OF SAXE-HILDBURGHAUSEN 1680-1826:

HOUSE OF WETTIN (Haus Wettin)

1680-1715: ERNEST (Ernst)

Born in 1655 at Gotha.

Father: Duke Ernest I of Saxe-Gotha. Mother: Duchess Elizabeth Sophia of Saxe-Altenburg.

Married in 1680 at Arolsen SOPHIA HENRIETTA of Waldeck (*1662 Arolsen,+1702 Erbach).

His issue who reigned: ERNEST FREDERICK I (*1681,+1724).

Died in 1715 in Hildburghausen.

Buried firstly with his consort Duchess Sophia Henrietta in the Castle Church in Hildburghausen. Reburied in the 20th c. in the Ducal Mound in the Town Cemetery (StÃ¤dtischen Friedhof) in Hildburghausen.

1715-1724: ERNEST FREDERICK I (Ernst Friedrich I.)

Born in 1655 at Gotha.

Father: Duke Ernest of Saxe-Hildburghausen. Mother: Duchess Sophia Henrietta of Waldeck.

Married in 1704 at Erbach Countess SOPHIA ALBERTINA of Erbach-Erbach (*1683 Erbach,+1742 Eisfeld).

His issue who reigned: ERNEST FREDERICK II (*1707,+1745).

Died in 1724 in Hildburghausen.

Buried firstly with his consort Duchess Sophia Albertina in the Castle Church in Hildburghausen. Reburied in the 20th c. in the Ducal Mound in the Town Cemetery (StÃ¤dtischen Friedhof) in Hildburghausen.

1724-1745: ERNEST FREDERICK II (Ernst Friedrich II.)

Born in 1707 at Hildburghausen.

Father: Duke Ernest Frederick I of Saxe-Hildburghausen. Mother: Duchess Sophia Albertina of Erbach-Erbach.

Married in 1726 at FÃ¼rstenau Countess CAROLINE of Erbach-FÃ¼rstenau (*1700 FÃ¼rstenau,+1758 Hildburghausen).

His issue who reigned: ERNEST FREDERICK III (*1727,+1780).

Died in 1745 in Hildburghausen.

Buried firstly with his consort Duchess Caroline in the Castle Church in Hildburghausen. Reburied in the 20th c. in the Ducal Mound in the Town Cemetery (StÃ¤dtischen Friedhof) in Hildburghausen.

1745-1780: ERNEST FREDERICK III (Ernst Friedrich III.)

Born in 1727 at KÃ¶nigsberg (Bavaria).

Father: Duke Ernest Frederick II of Saxe-Hildburghausen. Mother: Duchess Caroline of Erbach-FÃ¼rstenau.

Married firstly in 1749 at Hirschholm Princess LOUISE of Denmark (*1726 Copenhagen,+1756 Hildburghausen).

Married secondly in 1757 in Copenhagen Christiane SOPHIA CHARLOTTE of Brandenburg-Kulmbach (*1733 Neustadt an der Aisch,+1757 Seidingstadt).

Married thirdly in 1758 at Bayreuth Princess ERNESTINA AUGUSTA of Saxe-Weimar-Eisenach (*1740 Weimar,+1786 Hildburghausen).

His issue who reigned: FREDERICK (*1763,+1834; son of Ernestina Augusta).

Died in 1780 at Seidingstadt.

Buried firstly with his three consorts in the Castle Church in Hildburghausen. Reburied in the 20th c. in the Ducal Mound in the Town Cemetery (StÃ¤dtischen Friedhof) in Hildburghausen.

1780-1826: FREDERICK

(Friedrich; from 1826 Duke of Saxe-Altenburg)

DUCHY OF SAXE-ALTENBURG 1826-1918:

HOUSE OF WETTIN (Haus Wettin)

1826-1834: FREDERICK (Friedrich; 1780-1826 Duke of Saxe-Hildburghausen)

Born in 1763 at Hildburghausen.

Father: Duke Ernest Frederick III of Saxe-Hildburghausen. Mother: Duchess Ernestina Augusta of Saxe-Weimar.

Married in 1785 at Hildburghausen Princess CHARLOTTE of Mecklenburg-Strelitz (*1769 Hanover,+1818 Hildburghausen).

His issue who reigned:

-JOSEPH (*1789,+1868),

-Theresa (*1792,+1854; Queen of Bavaria),

-Louise (*1794,+1825; Duchess of Nassau),

-GEORGE (*1796,+1853).

Died in 1834 at Hummelshain.

Buried in the Ducal Mausoleum, Altenburg Cemetery. Reburied elsewhere in the same cemetery in 1974 (unmarked grave).

His consort Duchess Charlotte of Mecklenburg-Strelitz was buried in the Town Cemetery (StÃ¤dtischen Friedhof) at Hildburghausen.

1834-1848: JOSEPH

Born in 1789 at Hildburghausen.

Father: Duke Frederick of Saxe-Altenburg. Mother: Duchess Charlotte of Mecklenburg-Strelitz.

Married in 1817 at Kirchheim Princess AMALIA of WÃ¼rttemberg (*1799 Wallisfurth,+1848 Altenburg).

His issue who reigned:

-Marie (*1818,+1907; Queen of Hanover),

-Elizabeth (*1826,+1896; Grand Duchess of Oldenburg).

Abdicated in 1848.

Died in 1868 at Altenburg.

Buried with his consort Duchess Amalia of WÃ¼rttemberg in the Ducal Mausoleum, Altenburg Cemetery. Reburied elsewhere in the same cemetery in 1974 (unmarked grave).

1848-1853: GEORGE (Georg)

Born in 1796 at Hildburghausen.

Father: Duke Frederick of Saxe-Altenburg. Mother: Duchess Charlotte of Mecklenburg-Strelitz.

Married in 1825 at Ludwigslust Princess MARIA of Mecklenburg-Schwerin (*1803 Ludwigslust,+1862 Meiningen).

His issue who reigned: ERNEST I (*1826,+1908).

Died in 1853 at Hummelshain.

Buried with his consort Duchess Maria of Mecklenburg in the Ducal Mausoleum, Altenburg Cemetery. Reburied elsewhere in the same cemetery in 1974 (unmarked grave).

1853-1908: ERNEST I (Ernst I.)

Born in 1826 at Hildburghausen.

Father: Duke George of Saxe-Altenburg. Mother: Duchess Maria of Mecklenburg-Schwerin.

Married in 1853 at Dessau Princess AGNES of Anhalt (*1824 Dessau,+1897 Hummelshain).

Died in 1908 at Altenburg.

Buried with his consort Duchess Agnes of Anhalt in a sealed vault in Duchess Agnes' Memorial Church at Altenburg. His consort was previously buried in the Ducal Mausoleum in Altenburg Cemetery (until 1903).

1908-1918: ERNEST II (Ernst II.)

Born in 1871 at Altenburg.

Father: Prince Moritz of Saxe-Altenburg. Mother: Princess Auguste of Saxe-Meiningen.

Married firstly in 1898 at BÃ¼ckeburg Princess ADELAIDE of Schaumburg-Lippe (*1875 RatiboÅice/Ratiboritz,+1971 Ballenstedt). Divorced in 1920.

Married secondly in 1934 at Schloss FrÃ¶hliche Wiederkunft Maria Triebel (*1893 Waltershausen,+1957).

Abdicated in 1918.

Died in 1955 at Schloss FrÃ¶hliche Wiederkunft.

Buried with his second consort Maria Triebel in the ducal burial ground at Trockenborn-Wolfersdorf.

His first consort Duchess Adelheid of Schaumburg-Lippe was buried in the Mausoleum Garden in BÃ¼ckeburg.

REPUBLIC OF GERMANY SINCE 1918.
